channel.title: Web Client help
channel.description: Hola basically my webclient i tried on 6 people including myself. 3 people can play 3 people cannot play the people that cannot play are getting the "connecting to server retry in - " error i have no idea what the problem could be any ideas guys?

item.title: Web Client help

item.description:
@owndscape wrote:

Hola basically my webclient i tried on 6 people including myself.
3 people can play
3 people cannot play
the people that cannot play are getting the "connecting to server retry in - " error
i have no idea what the problem could be any ideas guys?
